title: ASEAN SUSTAINABLE ENERGY WEEK
description: ASEAN’S LARGEST INTERNATIONAL EXHIBITION AND CONFERENCE ON RENEWABLE ENERGY, ENERGY EFFICIENCY, ENVIRONMENTAL AND ELECTRIC VEHICLE TECHNOLOGY Altogether it will feature over 500 companies from 35 countries and include 8 National Pavilions and major Corporate Energy Stands. The event will also feature the latest innovative energy sources along with cutting-edge machinery and equipment that enhances overall business competitiveness.
